mdcr:Notes.div: Rating system defined by "Ley de Responsabilidad Social en Radio Television y Medios Electronicos"

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: Language Type-A
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: texts, images or sounds commonly used, which can be seen by children and adolescents without requiring guidance from mothers, fathers, representatives or guardians, and not classified in types "B" and " C ".

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: Lenguaje Type-A
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: Textos, im?genes o sonidos de uso com?n, que pueden ser presenciados por ni?os, ni?as y adolescentes sin que se requiera la orientaci?n de madres, padres, representantes o responsables, y que no clasifiquen en los tipos ?B? y ?C?.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: Language Type-B
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: texts, images or sounds, in common usage, have a vile character.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: Lenguaje Type-B
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: Textos, im?genes o sonidos que, en su uso com?n, tengan un car?cter soez.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: Lenguaje Type-C
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: Textos, im?genes o sonidos que, en su uso com?n, tengan car?cter obsceno, que constituyan imprecaciones, que describan, representen o aludan, sin finalidad educativa expl?cita, a ?rganos o pr?cticas sexuales o a manifestaciones escatol?gicas.

mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Label: Language Type-C
mdcr:Descriptor.mdcr:Definition: texts, images or sounds, in common usage, is obscene, constituting imprecations, to describe, depict or allude without explicit educational purpose, to bodies or sexual practices or eschatological events.
